name: Exceedingly Old TV Series Quiz | TV Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Which was NOT a character who was featured regularly on Walt Disney's
tv series?
questions.explanation:
Johnny Ringo.

	Robert Loggia played Baca, Tom Tryon played Slaughter and Leslie Nielsen played Marion. "Ringo" was a separate tv series.

questions.text: Who starred as "Sheena, Queen of the Jungle"?
questions.explanation:
Irish McCalla.

	McCalla starred as a sort of female Tarzan. Loughery, one-time beauty contest winner, starred in "Judge Roy Bean" (with Edgar Buchanan). Davis starred as "Annie Oakley". Albright starred with Craig Stevens in "Peter Gunn".

questions.text: Before starring as "Yancy Derringer", Jock Mahoney starred in what tv series?
questions.explanation:
Range Rider.

	Jeffrey Hunter was Houston (much later in time). "Dakotas" also came later and starred Jack Elam and Chad Everett (among others). "Boots" was an old western series.

questions.text: Which of these actors starred in "Black Saddle"?
questions.explanation:
Peter Breck.

	Before "Big Valley". Smith starred with Robert Fuller in "Laramie". Coffin starred in "26 Men". Robertson starred in "Tales of Wells Fargo" (and later in "Iron Horse").

questions.text: Roger Moore starred regularly in a tv series as what legendary hero?
questions.explanation:
Ivanhoe.

	Before "The Saint". There was an old series about Arthur and Lancelot; there was also one about William Tell. The closest thing to a show about Drake would be "The Buccaneers" (which starred Robert Shaw).

questions.text: "26 Men" is about the Rangers from what state?
questions.explanation:
Arizona.

	The Arizona Rangers. (There was also an old series, "Texas Rangers".)

questions.text: Who starred in the tv series "Colt 45"?
questions.explanation:
Wade Preston.

	Hart starred as Hawkeye and Forbes starred as Jim Bowie. Renaldo was the "Cisco Kid".

Ty Hardin.

	Walker starred as "Cheyenne" and Hutchins starred as "Sugarfoot". Taeger starred as "Hondo" (much later in time).

George Montgomery.

	With Audrey Totter. Payne was in "Restless Gun" and "Calhoun was in "The Texan". Jones starred (much later in time) as Jesse James.

questions.text: Andy Devine played the "sidekick" to what western hero?
questions.explanation:
Wild Bill Hickock.

	Devine was sidekick to Guy Madison (as Wild Bill). Hugh O'Brian was Earp, Guy WIlliams was Zorro (with a different sidekick) and Barry Sullivan starred as Pat Garrett (with Clu Gulager as Billy the Kid).
